thread.title: BRIEF-SRC Energy Issues Preliminary Q1 Daily Production 45,397 Boe/Day Vs 45,658 Boe/Day Last Year

title: BRIEF-SRC Energy Issues Preliminary Q1 Daily Production 45,397 Boe/Day Vs 45,658 Boe/Day Last Year
text: April 23, 2018 / 8:21 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-SRC Energy Issues Preliminary Q1 Daily Production 45,397 Boe/Day Vs 45,658 Boe/Day Last Year Reuters Staff 1 Min Read April 23 (Reuters) - SRC Energy Inc: * SRC ENERGY ISSUES PRELIMINARY FIRST QUARTER 2018 RESULTS; PROVIDES AN OPERATIONS UPDATE; ANNOUNCES FIRST QUARTER 2018 EARNINGS RELEASE AND CONFERENCE CALL DATES * FOR QUARTER ENDED MARCH 31, 2018 CRUDE OIL ACCOUNTED FOR APPROXIMATELY 50% OF TOTAL EQUIVALENT PRODUCTION VOLUMES * PRELIMINARY Q1 DAILY PRODUCTION 45,397 BOE/DAY VERSUS 45,658 BOE/DAY LAST YEAR Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
